name: Fearless Frizzle
description:
Stuffies are more than just toys. They protect their children through the night.

Play as Frizzle, little Aggie's new plush fox. Keep the lights on, keep shadows away, and don't wake anyone up! 

Note: This is a concept made for my game design class. Many features are incomplete as I ran out of time. Please read the instructions and controls in the menu.

Credits:

Modern Interiors by Limezu -  https://limezu.itch.io/moderninteriors

Cat Sprite by Elthen (Edited) - https://elthen.itch.io/2d-pixel-art-cat-sprites

Fox Sprite by Elthen - https://elthen.itch.io/2d-pixel-art-fox-sprites
